title: Windows 10 client surround sound issue
body:
Hey there,

I have an issue with my surround-sound headset (logitech g930) and the recent update to windows 10.
My headset has an off and on-switch for the surround-sound functionality. If the headset is in surround-sound-mode I can hear all sounds of the client als intended (like clicking on play, the shop or champ select music). But if I turn this mode off all sounds seem to come from the right. I don't know what causes this issue with the lol client because everything else works fine in stereo as well as in surround sound mode.
If I only listen to the left phone i hear the sounds very silent so i assume its just a left-right sound-balancing issue but I can't find anything on the internet about it.

Anyone experiencing the same or knowing how to fix it?

Thank you and best regards,
schdeef

replies.body:
Went to reddit just after posting that... Here is a solution:

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3gatzj/fix_sound_only_in_right_ear_for_lol_client/
